com.twitter.heron.scheduler

Class UpdateTopologyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.scheduler.UpdateTopologyManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class UpdateTopologyManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Class that is able to update a topology. This includes changing the parallelism of topology components

      • updateTopology

        public void updateTopology(PackingPlans.PackingPlan existingProtoPackingPlan,
                           PackingPlans.PackingPlan proposedProtoPackingPlan)
                    throws java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException,
                           java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        Scales the topology out or in based on the proposedPackingPlan
        Parameters:
        existingProtoPackingPlan - the current plan. If this isn't what's found in the state manager, the update will fail
        proposedProtoPackingPlan - packing plan to change the topology to
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
